lead_paragraph: Those who commandeer the cultural conversation online are more apt to know someone who has experienced a traumatic sexual encounter in a dorm than someone who has been beaten by a disgruntled ex-boyfriend.

headline.main: Far From Campus, a Different Kind of Violence Against Women

snippet: Those who commandeer the cultural conversation online are more apt to know someone who has experienced a traumatic sexual encounter in a dorm than someone who has been beaten by a disgruntled ex-boyfriend.
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column notes national outrage over campus sexual assault is diverting attention from nearly equally worrisome issue of domestic violence; argues part of reason issue has taken back seat in public's attention may be because domestic violence victims, including among New Yorkers, are more likely to live in some of city's poorest neighborhoods.
